Home » 13S3 Khandhavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 4 Okkantasaṃyutta » 4.1 Cakkhuvagga
4.1.8 Rūpataṇhāsutta
Okkantasaṃyutta
Cakkhuvagga
Rūpataṇhāsutta
309.
1057Sāvatthinidānaṃ. “Rūpataṇhā, bhikkhave, aniccā vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī; saddataṇhā…  gandhataṇhā…  rasataṇhā…  phoṭṭhabbataṇhā…  dhammataṇhā aniccā vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī. Yo, bhikkhave, ime dhamme evaṃ saddahati adhimuccati, ayaṃ vuccati ‘saddhānusārī…pe…  sambodhiparāyano’”ti.
1058Aṭṭhamaṃ.
